of stiches © 2026 ellie norrellavis background info/context the bitcoin lightning network ln is a layer-2 scaling solution built on top of the bitcoin blockchain it enables fast low-cost and nearly instant bitcoin transactions by moving most payments off the main chain users can open payment channels by locking bitcoin in an on-chain transaction like opening a shared tab within the channel they can send and receive bitcoin almost instantly - with very low fees and settlement in milliseconds - without broadcasting every single payment to the bitcoin blockchain only the final balance gets settled on-chain when the channel is closed hight transaction fees on the main bitcoin blockchain can be evaded it also enables micropayments usage-dependent streaming and value for value v4v content
